column3: Cannot operate/launch without it. Required for legal compliance, core infrastructure, or safety-critical features. Budget immediately (0-3 months).
Needed for quality, compliance, or scale. Professional services at user milestones. Plan within 6-12 months or triggered by growth.
Beneficial but timing is flexible. Marketing tools (wait for revenue), enhanced features, professional services (can DIY initially). Plan 12-24 months or revenue-triggered.
Speculative or far-future. Enterprise features, international expansion, significant team scaling. Consider only at 24+ months or major pivot.

column10: Notes
Annual $99 fee. Required for App Store distribution, Sign in with Apple, TestFlight. Cannot launch without this.
One-time $25 fee. Required for Play Store distribution. Cannot launch Android without this.
QuickBooks Online, Xero, or Wave. Essential for financial management.
Microsoft 365 Business Standard (email, productivity), Notion (project management). Proton Pass & Proton VPN, Figma
LLC annual reports, business licenses, registered agent fees. Legal requirement.

Business accounting services including: tax preparation, financial reporting, bookkeeping. Base cost ~$1,000/yr for simple solo operation. Scales to $2,000-2,500/yr with increased transaction volume, payroll complexity, or multi-state tax filing.
15% (subscriptions after year 1 for retained subscribers), 30% (monthly subscriptions). NOT separate processing fee, taken from revenue.
15% (first $1M revenue/year), 30% (after $1M revenue/year). NOT separate processing fee.
PRIMARY development tool for single developer + AI-assisted model. Currently in use. Essential for productivity.
Required for production deployment. Includes unlimited builds + EAS Update (OTA) + Device Cloud testing. No separate OTA cost.
Free tier ($0) - 500MB DB + 2GB bandwidth/mo, supports 10K users/300 DAU. Pro tier ($25/mo, $300/yr) at 10K-100K users.
Free tier ($0) - 2,000 minutes/mo, sufficient for 0-5K users. Paid tier ($12/mo) when exceeding limits.
Minimal legal package: AI drafts Privacy Policy, ToS, disclaimers ($0). Optional 1-hr lawyer review ($300-500). Most indie apps launch with $0.
DIY security validation: Free tools (Snyk, Dependabot, CodeQL) + AI code review. Optional professional spot-check ($300-500).
AI-assisted: App icon (Midjourney/DALL-E $0-20) + Screenshots (Rotato, Canva AI $0-100). Or freelancer $300-500.
AI-assisted annual audit: AI pre-scan + human expert review. Every 18-24 months after Year 1.
Consolidated: Quarterly privacy reviews, App Store label updates, regulatory monitoring, ad-hoc consultations. ~5-8 hrs/year at $300-500/hr.
AI-assisted: AI drafts IR plan, breach notification templates. Expert review 1-2 hrs.
k-anonymity validation, differential privacy, PHI detection. OSS libraries $0-1000.
Bundled: Cyber Insurance ($1M breach), General Liability, D&O. Bundled saves 10-15%.
10% buffer for unexpected costs, infrastructure failures, emergency fixes.
Free tier: 5K events/mo (0-1K users). Team tier ($29/mo, $348/yr) at 1K-10K users.
Updates per major release (2-4/year). $50-150/update with AI tools.
AI-assisted: DIY with Midjourney/Looka/Canva AI ($0) to freelancer polish ($500-1000).
AI-assisted: AI updates IR plan, generates test scenarios. Human review 1-2 hrs/year.
AI-first: Start with AI chatbot ($0-30/mo). Escalate to Zendesk ($49/mo) if needed.

Resend for all email: auth (via Supabase custom SMTP), transactional, onboarding. Free tier 3,000 emails/mo sufficient for <1K users. Pro tier $20/mo (50K emails) at scale. Modern DX, React Email templates, excellent deliverability. Cloudflare handles web hosting (free).
AI-assisted: CapCut AI, Runway ($0-100) to professional ($500-1000). High ROI for conversions.
For web subscriptions via FEAT-38. Cloudflare Pages/Workers for hosting (free). Plus international card fees.
Supplies, software licenses, unexpected operational costs. Buffer category.
Clinical safety review by LMFT/psychologist for negative visualization practices.
Books, academic journals, online courses on Stoicism.
Required for web app and professional email. Annual renewal.
AI-first: Free surveys + AI analysis. Scale to Maze/UserTesting ($99/mo) at 10K+ users.
Mental Health America, philosophy associations. Post-revenue. Optional.
NOT needed for consumer app. Only if pursuing B2B/enterprise healthcare partnerships.
Noun Project, IconScout. Optional - React Native Vector Icons (FREE) sufficient.
User-facing events. $0 pre-revenue (YouTube Live, Zoom free). Scale post-revenue.
Only needed when hiring employees. Not relevant to solo dev model.
Periodic consultation for classical source interpretation. Optional.
Stoic Week, mental health conferences. Travel + registration. Optional.
AI-augmented support: AI handles Tier 1, human for Tier 2 escalations and sensitive mental health concerns. ~20 hrs/week at $15-25/hr. Estimated $15,000-25,000/yr when triggered.
Project-based for specific expertise (advanced animations, native modules). $50-150/hr, ~5-10 hrs/week during projects. Estimated $5,000-15,000/yr when triggered. Can likely avoid with AI tools.
Project-based for app redesign, marketing materials. $50-100/hr. Estimated $2,000-5,000/yr when triggered. Can DIY with AI tools (Midjourney, Figma AI).
User research, roadmap, feature prioritization. $75-150/hr, ~10-15 hrs/week. Estimated $15,000-25,000/yr when triggered. Very unlikely for solo app.
